channel.title: New server!
channel.description: :) ve maded a server using mod taharok's server guide and using testscape ive come on start in varrock bank as usul and when i log out in it saves but how do i change server ip?? and how do i make my self admin??? i thoguh i new how to make my self admin go on savedcharacters and change characters rigths to 3 for admin 2 for mod and 1 for normal but when i do change it to 3 log out log back in and it goes back to one and on the server i dont go admin.....?

item.title: New server!
item.dc:creator: @bumbumlongtime bumbumlongtime
item.description:
@bumbumlongtime wrote:

oh ok thank you, matey for the ip thing would you be able to come on it a second?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 06:59:38 AM[/size][hr]port default server ip is 82.36.246.67 thank you, for your help[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 07:00:32 AM[/size][hr]how do i make it so peeps who log in as admin dont become one?

Read full topic

item.title: New server!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, from your machine, putting in 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, or your IP will all end up in the same basic place, your server. But for someone elses machine, only your IP will wind up on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: New server!
item.dc:creator: @bumbumlongtime bumbumlongtime
item.description:
@bumbumlongtime wrote:

ok thanks in client.java im in there now but i cant see any thing about admin list… i no my ip but to log on my server i put like 4 0000’s in

Read full topic

item.title: New server!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, the IP should be visible to you at the right bottom corner of all the posts you make, and to change the player rights you need to go in the thing saying “client.java”, and find “admin list”, and put your name in it somewhere.

Read full topic
